item.description: Hi everyone!!  Our next meetup Sept 9 7pm is going to be a potluck get together.  I am excited to let you know we have a new meeting place.   We will be meeting at KO's Raw Adventures!!  I am in the process of turning my 2nd floor apt into a raw food info, training and food prep center!  Can't wait for you all to come hang out there with me!!  Please bring an organic raw food dish enough for 6-8 people.  If you are new and not sure what to bring...a salad (fruit or veggie) is always good.  See you then!

group.name: Manchester Raw Vegan Food Meetup Group

item.name: Sept Meetup!! Raw Food Potluck!!
